mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (user_seq, content_id, register_time) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{contentId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmark WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.bookmark_seq, b.user_seq, b.content_id, b.register_time, a.title, a.addr1 FROM bookmark b JOIN attraction_info a ON b.content_id = a.content_id WHERE b.user_seq = #{userSeq}
